div.p: MORE REASON ON THE SHOW. THAT IS FOR SURE, WE NEED MORE
REASON ON "THE STEWART SHOW." YOU MAY REMEMBER BACK IN 2010
WHOPPI GOLDBERG AND JOY BEHAY STORMED OFF AFTER I SAID THAT
MUSLIMS KILLED. I KEPT THE DOOR OPEN ON "THE
VIEW" BECAUSE I FELT I HAD MY SAY AND GOT MY POINT ACROSS, AND
TODAY, THE TONE ON THE SHOW WAS MUCH DIFFERENT, AS THE LADIES
READ "KILLING JESUS" AND THEY APPARENTLY LIKED IT?
>> IN WRITING THIS BOOK, DO YOU BELIEVE IN THE MIRACLES --
>> I’M A ROMAN CATHOLIC, AND I SAY UP FRONT I BELIEVE IT.
BUT AS A HISTORIAN, I CAN’T PROVE IT.
>> WHY DID YOU CALL HIM CHRIST --
>> BECAUSE HE DENOTES MESSIAH. >> YOU SAID YOU GOT THE
INSPIRATION IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT --
>> THAT IS MY BELIEF SYSTEM, COME ON, YOU HAVE GOT TO KNOW
WHAT I SAID. I HAVE BEEN ALL OVER THE PLACE.
>> I’M SORRY, I DON’T READ EVERY SINGLE THING ABOUT YOU.
MY MISTAKE. >> THE CHRISTIAN DOCTRINE SAYS
THAT INSPIRATION IS GIVEN TO YOU BY THE HOLY SPIRIT.
I’M A CHRISTIAN. YEAH, SO HERE IS THE TIP OF THE
DAY. EVEN WHEN YOU DISAGREE WITH
SOMEONE, DON’T CUT OFF COMMUNICATION, UNLESS THE PERSON
IS DESTRUCTIVE. DETANTE CAN USUALLY BE REACHED
WITH RATIONAL PEOPLE, ONCE AGAIN, I APPRECIATE PROMOTING
THE BOOK AND HAVING ME ON, IT WAS A GOOD SEGMENT, WE GOT A LOT
DONE, AND THAT IS IT FOR US, PLEASE CHECK OUT THE WEBSITE,
